about.name: Hi, I'm Nicolas.
about.descriptions: ðŸŽ“ Recently graduated with a "Developer web full stack" diploma after completing a bootcamp training with the 3w Academy school! Passionate about web development, I am self-taught in 3D animations using WebGL with Three.js following online courses from Bruno Simon. At the same time, I am pursuing this field for a title of Web and Mobile Applications Designer with La Manu on a work-study basis.

project.title: Apps I've Built
project.description: Below are some of the projects I've built using React, API, Three.js & WebGL. Each project showcases my skills in these technologies.

FreshlyRestaurant.title: Freshly Restaurant
FreshlyRestaurant.subtitle: New York restaurant website
FreshlyRestaurant.description: Freshly Restaurant is a showcase site for a quintessential New York restaurant, showcasing it's unique ambiance and iconic dishes. This project was carried out as part of my training at 3W Academy.

Carnet_de_voyage.title: Hello World
Carnet_de_voyage.subtitle: Travel agency website
Carnet_de_voyage.description: Hello world is a project carried out during my training at 3W Academy. This site features a fictional travel agency with a modern design and attractive interface, providing an immersive and intuitive user experience.

cabinet_medical.title: Doctor Berthe medical center
cabinet_medical.subtitle: Consultation in the office and Teleconsultation
cabinet_medical.description: The Medical Cabinet of Dr. Berthe is a modern site dedicated to presenting medical services in Marseille, with a focus on teleconsultation via an interactive form. Designed with React and Tailwind CSS, it guarantees smooth navigation adapted to all devices.

haunted_house.title: Haunted House
haunted_house.subtitle: Three.js & WebGL
haunted_house.description: 3D Haunted house is an immersive experience whise you explore an interactive haunted house with dynamic light and shadow effects, and spooky animations created with WebGL, Three.js, and Blender.

coffee_smoke_shader.title: Coffee Smoke Shader
coffee_smoke_shader.subtitle: Three.js & WebGL and Blender
coffee_smoke_shader.description: Coffee Smoke Shader offers a fascinating visual experience by combining 3D animation and advanced shader techniques to create an interactive and realistic scene

fish-ocean.title: Fish Ocean
fish-ocean.subtitle: Immersive Ocean 3D
fish-ocean.description: The Fish Ocean Project is an interactive 3D experience that simulates an ocean with fish, created with React Fiber and Three.js. The project uses advanced visual effects to provide a realistic and dynamic immersion in a marine environment. Dive into the adventure!

earth.title: Earth
earth.subtitle: Three.js & WebGL
earth.description: The Earth Project is a 3D simulation of the Earth with realistic visual effects. This interactive experience displays dynamic transitions between day and night, moving clouds, a starry sky, and a continuous rotation of the Earth with the orbit of the Moon. The project uses Three.js and WebGL to create an immersive visualization of the Earth-Moon system with dynamic lighting effects and shadows

terrain.title: 3D Terrain Shader
terrain.subtitle: Three.js & WebGL
terrain.description: 3D Terrain Shader, an interactive project that leverages the latest technologies to generate a dynamic natural landscape. This immersive terrain allows you to manipulate elements like mountains, water, and overall dimensions using a customizable control panel. Using GLSL shaders and procedural algorithms, this project offers stunning and fully interactive visual rendering

raging-sea.title: raging-sea
raging-sea.subtitle: GLSL & Javascript
raging-sea.description: Raging Sea is a 3D animation simulating a dynamic ocean with realistic waves, created using Three.js, WebGL and Perlin Noise. It allows you to adjust the appearance of the water interactively.

helmet.title: Helmet
helmet.subtitle: WebGL & Html
helmet.description: Helmet is an interactive web application that allows you to view and manipulate a 3D helmet model. Ideal for online product presentation, it uses Three.js, WebGL, and Blender to deliver a fluid experience with realistic details and dynamic HTML descriptions.

testimonial_one.quote: Nicolas is a Junior Developer, who managed to get up to speed very with Web2 rebuilt to web3. he started with simple / repetitive tasks, and ended with the implementation of a new time and activity entry module. Nicolas understands and adapts very quickly to the context of the project, which allows us to move forward very quickly and to rely on his skills to bring projects to a successful conclusion
testimonial_one.name: Emmanuel BOCQUET

testimonial_two.quote: It's a pleasure to work with Nicolas! he has been a valuable addition to our team with his technical skills, critical thinking, and constant positive attitude. he is a person with whom it is pleasant to exchange ideas, but who is also productive and efficient. Although our professional paths have diverged, he will remain a true asset for our team and a real gain for his next opportunity.
testimonial_two.name: Anthony PERRIER

testimonial_three.quote: Nicolas is an extremely talented apprentice developer! Throughout his time with us, he has demonstrated a remarkable ability to quickly assimilate new skills. His natural curiosity and commitment to learning make his a dynamic force within our team. Nicolas brings a fresh and creative perspective to our projects, and his passion for development shines through in the quality of his work. We are lucky to have him with us and look forward to seeing his bright future in the field of development.
testimonial_three.name: Aziza MOUHOUB

testimonial_four.quote: Nicolas is a friendly colleague. The projects led by Nicolas are always carried out with seriousness and professionalism. His passion for web development is a real asset! I am convinced that he will carry out his future projects with the same rigor and seriousness. Bravo Nicolas!
testimonial_four.name: Sofia Rifiki

testimonial_five.quote: Nicolas is someone who truly engages in his work. During this year, I worked in the same development team. His attention to detail and exceptional listening skills make him a remarkable professional. His level of skill, particularly high for a junior profil, demonstrates his commitment to excellence in development. Nicolas is a real asset to a team and will fit perfectly into different projects.
testimonial_five.name: Jennifer BoÃ®

testimonial_six.quote: Nicolas is a pleasure to work with! he has been an asset to our team through his technical skills, critical thinking, and constant good spirits. he is someone who is pleasant to interact with, but also productive and efficient. Though our professional paths have separated, he will remain a real loss for our team and a real gain for his next endeavor.
testimonial_six.name: Laure CHAPERT

testimonial_seven.quote: Nicolas is a web developer whose hands-on approach and technical understanding clearly stand out. Throughout his apprenticeship at T4F and his training at the 3W Academy, Nicolas has demonstrated his competence in web development, particularly in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React. What is impressive about Nicolas is his ability to embrace challenges and continually improve himself. With a professional background including English-Japanese and chinese translation, he brings an enriching perspective to his web development work. His personal project (visible at https://fish-ocean.vercel.app/.) and his final project demonstrate his commitment and creativity. As an apprentice application developer at T4F, Nicolas has demonstrated excellent collaboration and project management skills, using tools like JIRA, Bitbucket, and Git. His proficiency in MySQL databases and experience with remote work complement his versatile profile. Nicolas is thisefore a committed and adaptable professional, ready to make a significant contribution in the field of web development. His potential to enrich a team and successfully lead innovative projects is undeniable.
testimonial_seven.name: Christine Vincent-Giuliano
